response:
Oh my goodness, darling! I can't believe they finally exonerated you after all those months of being falsely charged and imprisoned. It's such a weight off your shoulders, isn't it? *black*

I know how much you wanted to prove your innocence and show that you were not guilty of any wrongdoing. And now, with this exculpation, you can finally move on with your life and leave all the negative associations behind. *white*

It's just so wonderful to see you free from blame and able to start fresh. I know how much this has affected us both, but now we can look towards the future with hope and optimism. *black*

Of course, there will always be those who doubt your innocence and try to tarnish your reputation, but we know the truth and that's all that matters. *white*

Now, let's celebrate this new chapter in our lives and make the most of it! *black*
